\documentclass{article}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage{comment}
\usepackage{amsmath}

% ドキュメントクラスのコメント
\title{Mixed Comments Document}
\author{Test Author}
% 日付のコメント
\date{\today}

\begin{document}

% タイトルページ
\maketitle

% 序文セクション
\section{Introduction}

This document contains both single-line and multi-line comments.

\begin{comment}
This is a multi-line comment in the introduction.
It should be completely removed along with all the
single-line comments marked with % symbols.
\end{comment}

% 上記のコメントブロックの後のコメント
The text above and below should remain.

% メインコンテンツセクション
\section{Main Content}

% このセクションでは数式を扱います
Here are some mathematical expressions:

\begin{comment}
The following equation is very important:
$E = mc^2$
But this comment and the equation inside should be removed.
\end{comment}

% 実際の数式
\begin{equation}
    F = ma
\end{equation}

% サブセクションのコメント
\subsection{Subsection with Comments}

\begin{comment}
This subsection contains various elements:
- Lists
- Equations
- Text formatting

All of this should be removed.
\end{comment}

% このテキストは残る
This text should remain visible.

% 最終セクション
\section{Conclusion}

\begin{comment}
Final thoughts and conclusions would go here,
but this comment block should be removed entirely.
\end{comment}

% 文書の終了コメント
This is the end of our test document.

\end{document}
